required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Non-Interventional Follow Up Study For Subjects Who Received Sildenafil for Persistent Pulmonary Hypertension of the Newborn (PPHN)
clinical_study.official_title: A Follow Up Investigation For Patients Completing Study A1481276 To Investigate Developmental Progress 12 And 24 Months Following Completion Of Sildenafil Treatment

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This single center study will monitor the developmental progress of PPHN patients who received iv sildenafil in study A1481276. Two visits will be conducted, at 12 and 24 months following the end of study drug infusion.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will monitor developmental progress of PPHN patients for 2 years following study treatment, using Bayley III and Hammersmith tools. Data will be explored with descriptive statistics.

primary_outcome.measure: Physical Examination (Bayley Neurological Assessments, Ophthalmology Exam, Hearing)
Physical Examination (Bayley Neurological Assessments, Ophthalmology Exam, Hearing)
Medical History, to include clinically relevant hospital admissions
primary_outcome.description: Hearing test to be conducted by HCP

primary_outcome.measure: Medical History, to include clinically relevant hospital admissions
primary_outcome.description: Hearing test to be conducted by HCP

clinical_study.condition: Pulmonary Hypertension, Persistent, of the Newborn

study_pop.textblock: Pediatric patients who took part in study A1481276 following PPHN treatment with IV sildenafil

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any subject who received sildenafil treatment in study A1481276.
- Signed and dated informed consent document by legal guardian.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any subject who did not receive sildenafil treatment during study A1481276.

facility.name: Great Ormond Street Hospital, Paediatric Intensive Care

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.keyword: PPHN; development progress after PPHN; developmental progress after sildenafil.
